desc: Australian owned and Newcastle-based Hotspot Cricket looks to bring something new to the sport. With our recently developed stickers we provide you with the innovation to leave Hotspots on your bat.

layout.text:
Australian owned and Newcastle-based Hotspot Cricket looks to bring something new to the sport. With our impact stickers we look to change the way you train giving you instant feedback and understanding to where you strike the ball.

Get on board and #showusyourhotspot
